mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goods_2 WHERE bookmark IS NOT NULL ORDER BY bookmark desc
SELECT * FROM goods_2 WHERE release_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2022-07-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT * FROM goods_2 WHERE im_buy IS NOT NULL ORDER BY im_buy desc

SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark, num FROM (SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark, rownum as num FROM (SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark FROM goods_2 WHERE UPPER(brand) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{brand}||'%') OR UPPER(name_eng) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{name_eng}||'%') OR UPPER(name_kor) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{name_kor}||'%') ORDER BY bookmark DESC NULLS LAST)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM goods_2 WHERE UPPER(brand) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{brand}||'%') OR UPPER(name_eng) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{name_eng}||'%') OR UPPER(name_kor) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{name_kor}||'%') ORDER BY bookmark DESC NULLS LAST
